## Test Checklist (required)
- [ ] Load the page (no console errors)
- [ ] Clock In → big timer starts counting
- [ ] Break → starts break
- [ ] Break again → ends break
- [ ] Break cycle is 15 → 30 → 15
- [ ] Clock Out → totals update
- [ ] Logs tab shows expected entries

## Safety Checks
- [ ] `index.html` element IDs match `app.js` selectors
- [ ] No unintended storage key changes (no wiping saved data)
- [ ] No unrelated refactors
